summary: When her father goes out of town, beautiful A-student Natalie lets best friends Jeff and Polly move in. Separately and together, the trio of young teens learn much about life, love, and growing up.
cast: Jennifer Connelly|Byron Thames|Maddie Corman|Alan Boyce|Michael Zaslow|Polly Draper|Marshall Bell|Billy Wirth|Terry Kinney|Spalding Gray|Michael Higgins|Denny Dillon|Lauren Holly|Paul Martell|Margo Skinner|Matthew Lewis|Brian Freilino|Patricia O'Connell|Noelle Parker|Don Koll|Vivien Straus|Vincent Capolupo|James Bigwood|Ed O'Ross|Van Brooks|Anthony Bishop|Timothy Owen Waldrip|Eddie Cipot|Erna Rossman|Jane Bernstein|Ronda Swindell|Harry Wendelstedt
keywords: unrequited love|loss of mother|runaway teen|heartbreak|falling in love
title: Deslices de juventud
